page.title: 18Wethersfield Air Base.
page.content: The air base is situated to the East of Finchingfield and to the North of Wethersfield.It is on high ground,but the ground it is built on is flat because you cant have a bumpy runway. It doesnt normally have planes landing there,but it is always on standby. It has air shows and practice flights, thats normally the only time when aeroplanes are there.There are quite a lot of things to do at the air base, there is Bowling,Basketball,Youth club,Cinema and lots more.There is a school there,the Americans go there and when they finish primary school they go on to Lakenheath in Suffolk. Not all the people that work there live there,they live all over Essex and Suffolk.The R.A.F own the base, the Americans lease it and Braintree district council collect the rates.
